name: loginJWT
queries: SELECT user_id, auth_token, firstname, lastname, profile_picture, username FROM users_by_email WHERE email = ? AND password = ?;
description: User login with JWT token authentication

name: login
queries: SELECT user_id, firstname, lastname, profile_picture, username FROM users_by_email WHERE email = ? AND password = ?;

name: testTable
description: testing if table has some valid data

name: sphereview
queries: SELECT event_id, event_name, venue, title_picture, event_datetime FROM recommendations_by_user WHERE user_id = ? AND event_datetime > ?;
description: The recommendations for a specific user, identified by user_id.

name: profile
queries: SELECT description, birthdate, username, isCompany, firstname, lastname FROM userdetails_by_user WHERE user_id = ?;
description: Profile of the Users, needs Authentication
